A version of '''[[Minecraft Indev]]''' was released on '''February 19, 2010'''.<ref>[[wordofnotch:398675624|Furnaces and Loot!]] – The Word of Notch, February 19, 2010</ref>

== Additions ==
{{Additions table
|Furnace
|Lit Furnace
|Flint
|Raw Porkchop
|Cooked Porkchop
}}

=== Blocks ===
'''{{Animate|Furnace (S) JE1.png; Lit Furnace (S) JE1.png|32px}} [[Furnace]] and [[Lit Furnace]]'''
* Used to smelt blocks and items.
* Replaces the old smelting system.
* [[Stick]], [[planks]] and [[coal]] can be used as fuel.
** Smelted 0.5 items per [[stick]].
** Smelted 1.5 items per [[planks]].
** Smelted 8 items per [[coal]].
* Lit furnaces drop themselves instead of regular furnaces.
* Crafted with [[cobblestone]].
{{Crafting table
|A1=Cobblestone
|B1=Cobblestone
|C1=Cobblestone
|A2=Cobblestone
|C2=Cobblestone
|A3=Cobblestone
|B3=Cobblestone
|C3=Cobblestone
|Output=Furnace}}

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Flint JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Flint]]'''
* Used to craft [[flint and steel]].
* Has 10% chance of dropping from [[gravel]].

'''[[File:Cooked Porkchop JE1.png|32px]] [[Cooked porkchop]]'''
* New food item.
* Restores {{Health|8}} health.

'''[[File:Raw Porkchop JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Raw porkchop]]'''
* New food item.
* Can be cooked into [[cooked porkchop]]s.
* Restores {{Health|3}} health.

=== General ===
'''[[Splash]]'''
* Added new splashes:
** "Loved by millions!"
** "Ultimate edition!"
** "Freaky!"
** "You've got a brand new key!"
** "Water proof!"
** "Uninflammable!"
** "Whoa, dude!"
** "All inclusive!"
** "Tell your friends!"
** "NP is not in P!"
** "Notch <3 Ez!"
** "Music by C418!"

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Gravel JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Gravel]]'''
* Now has a 10% chance of dropping flint.

''' [[File:Lava JE8.png|32px]] [[Lava]] '''
* Texture changed from [[File:Lava JE6.png|32px]].
* Now no longer smelt items.

'''[[File:Oak Log (UD) JE2.png|32px]] [[Log]]'''
* No longer breaks faster than stone.

'''Stone type blocks'''
* Now require a pickaxe to drop an item.<ref name="Forum2">{{link|url=https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/archive/alpha/alpha-survival-single-player/797043-help-cant-mine|title=Help: Can't mine!|author=the9thdude|website=Minecraft Forum|date=February 19, 2010}}</ref>

=== Items ===
'''General'''
* Can no longer be smelt with fire.
* All items now get destroyed by fire and lava.

'''[[File:Coal JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Coal]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Coal JE1.png|32px]].

'''[[File:Flint and Steel JE3 BE1.png|32px]] [[Flint and steel]] '''
* Texture changed from [[File:Flint and Steel JE2.png|32px]].
* Is no longer dropped by [[mob]]s.
* Can now be crafted from one [[iron ingot]] and one [[flint]].
{{Crafting table
|A2=Iron Ingot
|B3=Flint
|Output=Flint and Steel}}

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Creeper JE3 BE1.png|32px]] [[Creeper]]s'''
* Now dropped 0–2 [[gunpowder|sulphur]] upon death.

'''[[File:Pig JE1.png|32px]] [[Pig]]s'''
* Now dropped 0–2 [[raw porkchop]]s upon death.

'''[[File:Skeleton JE1.png|32px]] [[Skeleton]]s'''
* Now dropped 0–2 [[arrow]]s upon death.

'''[[File:Spider JE3 BE2.png|32px]] [[Spider]]s'''
* Now dropped 0–2 [[string]]s upon death.

'''[[File:Zombie JE1.png|32px]] [[Zombie]]s'''
* Now dropped 0–2 [[feather]]s upon death.

=== Gameplay ===
''' Smelting '''
* All smelting recipes produce 1 output item.
* Removed coal ore to coal smelting recipe.
* Removed gravel to glass smelting recipe.

== Trivia ==
*This is the last version where logs would drop planks instead of themselves.
